ticket.title: Unable to run working edge app with vendored rails.
ticket.original-body:
@@@ bash
$ ruby ~/Code/rails/railties/bin/rails edge_app /Users/andriytyurnikov/Code/rails/actionpack/lib/action_dispatch.rb:28:in `require': no such file to load -- rack (LoadError) from /Users/andriytyurnikov/Code/rails/actionpack/lib/action_dispatch.rb:28 from /Users/andriytyurnikov/Code/rails/railties/lib/rails.rb:6:in `require' from /Users/andriytyurnikov/Code/rails/railties/lib/rails.rb:6 from /Users/andriytyurnikov/Code/rails/railties/bin/rails:23:in `require' from /Users/andriytyurnikov/Code/rails/railties/bin/rails:23
@@@
@@@ bash $ ruby -v ruby 1.8.7 (2008-08-11 patchlevel 72) [universal-darwin10.0] @@@
P.S. See ticket 2567 - same thing here?

P.S. See ticket 2567 - same thing here?

version.title: Unable to run working edge app with vendored rails.

version.body: (from [76e732a7be690f09d1e5d6c97138a6eb7d263423]) Fix the documentation for root :to. It should use a fully qualified controller#action syntax (Closes #3606) http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/76e732a7be690f09d1e5d6c97138a6eb7d263423
version.body-html: (from [76e732a7be690f09d1e5d6c97138a6eb7d263423]) Fix the documentation for root :to. It should use a fully qualified controller#action syntax (Closes #3606) http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/76e732a7be690f09d1e5d6c97138a6...
version.title: Unable to run working edge app with vendored rails.

version.body: The commit to fix this ticket doesn't seem to be related...maybe it's a typo?
version.body-html: The commit to fix this ticket doesn't seem to be related...maybe it's a typo?
version.title: Unable to run working edge app with vendored rails.
Unable to run working edge app with vendored rails.
Unable to run working edge app with vendored rails.

version.body:
Wups, wrong ticket.
The problem here is that rails/master depends on rack/master. You currently need to build that gem by hand and install it. By the time rails 3.0 is out, rack 1.1.0 is out, and we'll depend on that and it'll work.
version.body-html:
Wups, wrong ticket.

The problem here is that rails/master depends on rack/master. You currently need to build that gem by hand and install it. By the time rails 3.0 is out, rack 1.1.0 is out, and we'll depend on that and it'll work.
version.title: Unable to run working edge app with vendored rails.
